author: davi
msg: External linkage declarations are often forgotten and also confuses indent tools.
Add the APR_BEGIN_DECLS and APR_END_DECLS helper macros which are more easily remembered.

author: davi
msg: Create a development branch for experimenting with a new asynchronous event
notification API and other related components.

author: bayard
msg: Removing the pmc@jakarta bits. Ask on dev@commons if you're not in the unix group, and we don't need to send RESULT emails to private@ anymore
